lines.text: My name is Claude Woodward, and I am a musician and inventor and I am seeking sponsorship from your company. I’ve been playing keyboard/synthesizer since the early 70’s and I am very passionate about the ability to make the sound expressive. To this end I have developed a number of gadgets and devices to interface my body with the instrument.     I now have a system called the ‘Claude Controller’ - a MIDI controller which involves two significant things. First there's my 'vibe bar', which is kind of like a whammy bar for keyboard allowing you to impart (mechanical) vibrato and different degree
